message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to you. Given its potential, I'm proposing an initial offer of $1,350,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so feel free to share your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but $1,200,000 is too low for me. Would you consider $1,275,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $1,200,000. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $1,225,000. Can we discuss this price?
